title: 92x25: Waivers Pursuant to 18 U.S.C. § 208(b)(3) for Members of Advisory Committees
summary: Pre-meeting activities, such as reviewing written materials, by advisory committee members in preparation for a meeting might rise to the level of personal and substantial participation under 18 U.S.C. § 208(a). Waivers under 18 U.S.C. § 208(b)(3) must be granted prior to such participation by an advisory committee member.
